request","tokenId":"id of the token which will be used for voting"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"_handleUserTokenTransfers(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"This function will be called when transfer","previousBalance":"this is the old balance of the user","user":"address of the user whose balance is being changed"}},"castVote(uint256,bool)":{"details":"This function is called by any user This function is called at the end of a `safeBatchTransferFrom` after the balances have been updated. NOTE: To accept the transfer(s), this must return `bytes4(keccak256(\"onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)\"))` (i.e. 0xbc197c81, or its own function selector).","params":{"data":"Additional data with no specified format","from":"The address which previously owned the token","ids":"An array containing ids of each token being transferred (order and length must match values array)","operator":"The address which initiated the batch transfer (i.e. msg.sender)","values":"An array containing amounts of each token being transferred (order and length must match ids array)"},"returns":{"_0":"`bytes4(keccak256(\"onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)\"))` if transfer is allowed"}},"onERC1155Received(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Handles the receipt of a single ERC1155 token type. This function is called at the end of a `safeTransferFrom` after the balance has been updated. NOTE: To accept the transfer, this must return `bytes4(keccak256(\"onERC1155Received(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)\"))` (i.e. 0xf23a6e61, or its own function selector).","params":{"data":"Additional data with no specified format","from":"The address which previously owned the token","id":"The ID of the token being transferred","operator":"The address which initiated the transfer (i.e. msg.sender)","value":"The amount of tokens being transferred"},"returns":{"_0":"`bytes4(keccak256(\"onERC1155Received(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)\"))` if transfer is allowed"}},"setDepositAmount(uint256)":{"details":"This function sets the VOTING_DEPOSIT percentage","params":{"depositAmount":"This is the new deposit amount needed for creating ballot"}},"setMinTurnOut(uint256)":{"details":"This function sets the MIN_TURN_OUT percentage","params":{"minTurnOut":"This is the new turnout percentage value"}},"setOwnerAddress(address)":{"details":"This function sets the owner address","params":{"ownerAddress":"This is the address of the owner"}},"setVotingPeriod(uint256)":{"details":"This function sets the VOTING_BLOCK_PERIOD percentage","params":{"votingPeriod":"This is the voting period"}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. This function call must use less than 30 000 typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256,uint256,uint256,string memory,string memory,uint256,address) payable external returns (uint256)
function (uint256,uint256,uint256,string memory,string memory,uint256,address) payable external returns (uint256)

NewVersionRequestResult(uint256,uint256,.details: this event is generated when result of a ballot is declared

params.ballotId: this is the ballot Id for which result is declared
params.minTurnOut: this status indicates if minimum amount of user showed up for voting
params.newRecordId: this is the new record Id
params.result: this is the status of the result
params.tokenId: This is the id of the token that is linked to this ballot
params.versionReqId: This is the id of newVersionRequest

NewVersionVoting(address,uint256,uint256.details: This is when a vote is given by user.

params.ballotId: Id of the ballot where voting is stored
params.versionRequestId: This is the id of the recordVersionRequest structure that is linked to this ballot
params.vote: State of vote : true for yes and false for No

NewVersionVotingBallotCreated(address,ui.details: This is emitted when a voting ballot is created

params.ballotId: Id of the ballot where voting is stored
params.createdAt: time when the ballot was created
params.depositAmount: this is the amount of tokens deposited by user in order to create voting
params.versionRequestId: This is the id of the recordVersionRequest structure that is linked to this ballot

VersionRequest(uint256,(string,string,ui.details: This event is generated when New Record Version is created

params.communityToken: New token data for community token
params.governanceToken: New token data for governance token
params.requestId: This is the id of the new record version request
params.tokenId: id of the token which will be used for voting

_handleUserTokenTransfers(address,uint25.details: This function will be called when either user is transferring the tokens to other account, or is receiving tokens from other tokens.

params.newBalance: this is the new balance of the user that is after the transfer
params.previousBalance: this is the old balance of the user
params.user: address of the user whose balance is being changed

castVote(uint256,bool).details: This function is called by any user to cast vote

params.versionReqId: this is the id of the new version request for which user is voting
params.vote: this is the state of the vote, if true than it means the vote is in favour of the ballot

claimNewRecordTokens(uint256).details: This function is for distributing of the tokens of new record version

params.versionReqId: This is the version Request Id for which token needs to be claimed

createNewRecordVersion((string,string,st.details: This function will create new record version from existing record

params.params: required data for creation of new record version
params.platformFee: this is the incentive amount for the UI maintainer
params.platformWallet: this is the UI providers wallet

declareWinner(uint256).details: This function can be called from external source and also from within the contract

params.versionReqId: this is the id of the new version request to which the winner is to be declared

initialize(address,address).details: This function sets the treasury Contract address and the governance address

params.newGovernanceContractAddress: This is the address for the governance contract
params.newTreasuryContractAddress: This is the new address of treasury contract

initialize(address,address,address,addre.details: This is to set the address of the contracts

params.newGovernanceContractAddress: This is the address for the governance contract
params.treasuryContractAddress: Takes the address of new treasury contract as parameter
params.treasuryCoreContractAddress: Takes the address of new treasury core contract as parameter

onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,u.details: Handles the receipt of a multiple ERC1155 token types. This function is called at the end of a `safeBatchTransferFrom` after the balances have been updated. NOTE: To accept the transfer(s), this must return `bytes4(keccak256("onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)"))` (i.e. 0xbc197c81, or its own function selector).

params.data: Additional data with no specified format
params.from: The address which previously owned the token
params.ids: An array containing ids of each token being transferred (order and length must match values array)
params.operator: The address which initiated the batch transfer (i.e. msg.sender)
params.values: An array containing amounts of each token being transferred (order and length must match ids array)

onERC1155Received(address,address,uint25.details: Handles the receipt of a single ERC1155 token type. This function is called at the end of a `safeTransferFrom` after the balance has been updated. NOTE: To accept the transfer, this must return `bytes4(keccak256("onERC1155Received(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)"))` (i.e. 0xf23a6e61, or its own function selector).

params.data: Additional data with no specified format
params.from: The address which previously owned the token
params.id: The ID of the token being transferred
params.operator: The address which initiated the transfer (i.e. msg.sender)
params.value: The amount of tokens being transferred

setDepositAmount(uint256).details: This function sets the VOTING_DEPOSIT percentage

params.depositAmount: This is the new deposit amount needed for creating ballot

setMinTurnOut(uint256).details: This function sets the MIN_TURN_OUT percentage

params.minTurnOut: This is the new turnout percentage value

setOwnerAddress(address).details: This function sets the owner address

params.ownerAddress: This is the address of the owner

setVotingPeriod(uint256).details: This function sets the VOTING_BLOCK_PERIOD percentage

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[EIP section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.
